pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Fast and Scalable Joint Estimator for Learning Multiple Related Sparse Gaussian Graphical Models // The FASJEM (A Fast and Scalable Joint Estimator for Learning Multiple Related Sparse Gaussian Graphical Models) is a joint estimator which is fast and scalable for learning multiple related sparse Gaussian graphical models. For more details, please see https://www.cs.v irginia.edu/yanjun/paperA14/2017_JEM_combined.pdf.
